page.title: 15CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES
page.content: The playgroup is held in the church rooms on Tuesdays,Wednesdays and Fridays,between 9am and 12am,for children aged 3 years to school age. It is run by a supervisor, Mrs L Mears and play leader,Mrs S.Farrow, helped by 2 mums. There are 24 children each morning and the cost is 65p a session Vicky tells us Buzz Club is for children aged 8 _ 11 years and is held on Wednesday evenings at Prince Andrew's Chapel.They usually have a game to start, then have a quiz about last weeks Bible story.There is a points system with 2 teams-Black and yellow knights.We have a Bible story and a memory verse to learn for next week.We get a point for it.In the summer they go swimming and sometimes play rounders on the village green.
